name: Indestructible Phalanx Prime
description:
Get pumped and get ready.

Jump into the bio-soft shoes of the cyber-augmented techno-punk Phalanx Prime and wreak havoc on Neo-New-Portland-Second's security drones as you search for meaning in this crazy world.

Works on keyboard or gamepad. Left and right activates the running sequence in your bio-soft footware. Up or the A button jumps. There's other controls, too!
